emissions.closest_match_explanation: Matched '400 g beetroot' to 'beet, red, raw' as it is the least processed and a direct match for raw beetroot.
Matched '1 dl dark balsamic vinegar' to 'vinegar' as it is a general category for vinegar and the best available match.
Matched '600 g cod loin' to 'cod, fillet, raw' as it is the least processed and a direct match for raw cod.
Matched '2.5 dl water' to 'water, tap, drinking, average values' as it is the most appropriate match for water with no processing.
Matched '75 g finely chopped shallots' to 'onion, raw' as it is the least processed and a direct match for raw onions.
Matched '200 g cold butter' to 'butter, salt added' as it is the closest match for butter with no additional processing specified.
Matched 'fresh herbs' to 'basil, fresh' as it is a common fresh herb and the best available match.
Matched '100 g fried bacon cubes' to 'bacon, frying, raw' as it is the closest match for fried bacon cubes considering processing.
